**Having a Meltdown from the Spectre of ZombieLoad Cacheout of your Intel VPS?**

**CacheOut** your old Xeon's vulnerability and **CacheIn** on a brand new **AMD Ryzen VPS** today with our Switcher special+! Our premium **NexusCare** service comes free of charge. Stocks are running low due to high demand. Contact a NexusCare service ambassador today!

Here at Nexus Bytes, we do things differently. You are not just a customer or another line in our CRM database. You are part of the Nexus Bytes family and we only want the best for our family. We are not going to sell our family members what we won’t buy for ourselves. That’s the Nexus Bytes difference.

**Switch from Your INTEL XEON powered VPS to our AMD Ryzne Powered VPS's today, Get upto 6 additional months free on us via Service Credit!!** Promo expires February, 3rd, 2020, Monday 11:59 PM (EST)

If you are an existing Family member, promo code : **FamilyFirst** will grant you additional 5% discount for life!

**How to Redeem :**

*   Must be eligible for either [Sweet Switch or Contract buyout Special!](https://nexusbytes.com/knowledgebase/31/Switcher-Special-and-Contract-Buy-Out-Guidelines.html)
*   Signup for any plan with either Semi-annual or Annual billing term.
*   Only Valid for our "VPS-" (0.5G Is not eligible) and "Pool" Product line. Storage plans aren't eligible for the Cacheout Promo.
*   Please open a ticket. Submit all the required documents.
*   Submit a side by side CPU benchmark using the following commands :
`wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/masonr/yet-another-bench-script/master/yabs.sh` 
`chmod 777 yabs.sh`
`./yabs.sh -di`
* Depending on your eligibility, we will apply 2 additional month worth of service credit on top of Sweet Switch or Contract Buyout credit!
